ingredients.item: 2 x 500ml packs Cooks’ Ingredients Chicken Stock
2cm piece of ginger, peeled and cut into fine matchsticks
70g brown basmati, red Camargue & wild rice
200g pack cavolo nero, tough stalks removed, leaves shredded
200g pack mixed exotic mushrooms, torn into bitesized pieces
½ x 28g pack coriander, leaves and stalks chopped

instructions.step: Pour the chicken stock into a large saucepan, and add the ginger, chicken and rice. Bring to the boil and simmer for 20-25 minutes, skimming off any froth from the surface, until the chicken is cooked through, the juices run clear and there is no pink meat. Carefully remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Continue to simmer the soup gently for 5 minutes. Once the chicken is cool enough, roughly shred using 2 forks.

Return the chicken to the pan, along with the cavolo nero and mushrooms. Simmer for a further 2 minutes, until the cavolo nero is wilted. Add the soy sauce. Divide the soup between 4 bowls and sprinkle over the coriander.
